title: Britney Spears shares throwback snaps of herself cuddling up with Sam Asghari during summer getaway
text:
First it was all work, then it was all about a little flirty play.

Britney Spears posted a video of herself doing some acrobatic stretches, along with a couple photos showing her from behind as she lifted a barbell at a gym in the early afternoon on Thursday.

Some five hours later, the Oops!... I Did It Again singer took to Instagram again and shared a series of throwback snaps showing herself cuddling up with beau Sam Asghari.

Flirty: Britney Spears took to Instagram on Thursday shared a series of throwback snaps showing herself cuddling up with beau Sam Asghari

'I always have a great time with this one @samasghari,' she proudly wrote in the caption.

In one photo taken during their trip to Miami in June, Spears has her legs wrapped around her man as they are sprawled out on the front of a boat.

The Toxic star shows off her toned figure in a black and yellow bikini in another image as she laid on her beau's chiseled physique on that very same boat.

The pair also took a selfie from the backseat of their car during their summer holiday, just as the singer playfully stuck out her tongue.

Summer loving: The photos showed the couple sprawled out on a boat during their Miami getaway in June

Say cheese: The pair also took a selfie from the backseat of their car during their summer holiday, just as the singer playfully stuck out her tongue

The pop superstar, 37, sported a turquoise sports bra with a pair of short blue gym shorts, during her workout at a gym earlier on Thursday.

'I get so excited when I lift the bar. I’ve done it one other time in a private room but never with a lot of people around!!!!, she began in her inspirational caption.

'I was at Equinox here and my legs were shaking… until a guy walked by and said “Go for it," so I did it!!! Just think about it... that one guy changed my whole day because he believed in me for literally two seconds!!!!!'

She added: 'If you're out there in this big world today I thank you for telling me to go for it!!!'

Working it: Earlier Thursday, Spears shared a video and two photos of her workout at a gym

Go for it: The post came with an inspirational message in the caption: 'If you're out there in this big world today I thank you for telling me to go for it!!!'

Spears and Asghari were first romantically linked after meeting on the set of her Slumber Part music video in 2016.

Their relationship blossomed in-between takes.

'We were shooting and we were doing this scene where I was doing the walk scene through the hall to go through the door to go to the bedroom, and we were sitting there and we were waiting and waiting together for 20 minutes at a time,' she confessed during an interview with AMP 103.7's Fast In The Morning With Nathan Fast And Sybil Summers.

They eventually went Instagram official in New Year's Day 2017.
description: Britney Spears shared some throwback snaps of herself cuddling up with beau Sam Asghari during recent summer Miami getaway: 'I always have a great time with this one.'
